text: Hajja haiche nirdista mahasamuhata. Eteke yiye e'i mahasamuhata hajja karaibalai sthira karae si yena hajjara samayata strai-sambhoga, an'yaya acarana arau kalaha-bibada nakarae; arau tomaloke yi satkame'i nakaraa kiya seya allahe jane arau tomaloke sambala sangraha karaa. Niscaya ata'itakai uttama sambala haiche takbaraa. He bibeka sampanna byaktisakala! Tomaloke kerala morae'i takbaraa aralambana karaa
